passed_checks.check_name: Ensure API gateway method has authorization or API key set
Ensure that AWS Lambda function is not publicly accessible
code_block:
resource "aws_lambda_permission" "apigw_permission" {
  statement_id  = "AllowAPIGatewayInvoke"
  action        = "lambda:InvokeFunction"
  function_name = var.lambda_function_name
  principal     = "apigateway.amazonaws.com"
  source_arn    = "${aws_api_gateway_rest_api.api.execution_arn}/*/*"
}

passed_checks.check_name: Ensure that AWS Lambda function permissions delegated to AWS services are limited by SourceArn or SourceAccount
code_block:
resource "aws_lambda_permission" "apigw_permission" {
  statement_id  = "AllowAPIGatewayInvoke"
  action        = "lambda:InvokeFunction"
  function_name = var.lambda_function_name
  principal     = "apigateway.amazonaws.com"
  source_arn    = "${aws_api_gateway_rest_api.api.execution_arn}/*/*"
}

passed_checks.check_name: Ensure no hard-coded secrets exist in lambda environment
code_block:
resource "aws_lambda_function" "container_lambda" {
  function_name = var.lambda_name
  package_type  = "Image"
  image_uri     = var.image_uri
  role          = aws_iam_role.lambda_exec_role.arn
  timeout       = 30
  memory_size   = 128
}

passed_checks.check_name: Ensure Lambda Runtime is not deprecated
code_block:
resource "aws_lambda_function" "container_lambda" {
  function_name = var.lambda_name
  package_type  = "Image"
  image_uri     = var.image_uri
  role          = aws_iam_role.lambda_exec_role.arn
  timeout       = 30

}

Ensure no hard coded AWS access key and secret key exists in provider

provider "aws" {
